data.message: Better get used to Trump for 8 years dude. Lol! #Trump You lost me and half your fans tonight. Fuck me? Fuck you too, hypocrite. The left is the most open minded group, so they say. I call bullshit on that 😂 So many hypocrites on both sides with these comments. But, I spent hundreds of dollars as a kid on your records and you say fuck me? That's too much ass wipe!

replies.message: Enjoy the impeachment. tRump is unfit and treasonous.
Colluding with a foreign country to influence an election and being mentally unfit. Enjoy!
All you new wave leftists laugh now and continue to be a major source of the problem of the division of this country which started under Obama, I may add.

Considering you preach love and peace and unity 😂. What about Eminems rap talks about any of this? It's all moot when he tells many of his fans to F off. Just go crawl in a hole for 8 years and let us hard working Americans run this shit for a while. 👍
Jesse Ashe yeah give me your informed opinion. I'm honestly open to hearing you out. Not being defensive...
And, I'm sure if good old Eminem ever did this rap about Obama, Clinton or Sanders you'd all be pissed off too, just saying! 😂
Colluding with a foreihn country? U r joking right? Good lord. No evidence. Never happened.

Jesse Ashe lmao !! On what grounds ? U people are so Brainwashed ! Because if people like this white rapper . Who takes it on himself an his platform to spread basically stupid shit about a guy that everyone loved up till he ran for office . 
Funny drawing that line has an will change everything  for Eminem . 
I still think your great but obviously u didn’t think what I an a billion other people like me would think about your opinion. I’ll let myself out !!deuces !!!

No one loved Drama tRump he was a D-list celebrity sideshow that no American banks or realestate firms would do business with. As far as impeachment I join the Republicans in Washington who think he is unfit and needs to be baby sat, in addition to the treason,and obstruction of justice. Also tRump has the lowest approval rating in history, he is perpetuating us be divded by trolls, can't staff the government which leads to shit like FEMA not being staffed during the crisis in Puerto Rico and is a nearly daily embarrassment. Keep trolling guys, but listen to Em when he says F*ck you.
So you'd rather diss someone who contributed to your life to back someone who just used you for your vote? Welp ... guess you made your choice.
